question: 新品
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>new</kanji> <kanji>product</kanji> is something that's <vocabulary>brand new</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>new item</vocabulary>. I like looking around the store for the brand new stuff because it's interesting!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Notice though that <ja>ひん</ja> changes to <ja>ぴん</ja>. This is because you're buying some <vocabulary>brand new</vocabulary> pins?
